Question: Power Beauty (Dongguan) Industrial Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Power Beauty (Dongguan) Industrial Co., Ltd

Product Highlight:
- Outdoor LED Floating Duck Lamp Speaker
- Outdoor LED Portable Ball Lamp Speaker
- Outdoor LED Table Lamp
- Outdoor LED Wireless Charge Side Table With Bluetooth Speaker

Specifications:
- Various outdoor LED lamp speakers and table lamps
- Wireless charging and Bluetooth speaker integration
- Innovative floating and portable designs
- High-quality LED lighting with waterproof features
